page.title: 02Tuxford Comp. School 2
page.content:
are lots of games areas which are quite big. All the pupils I saw were very kind and polite and will show you the way to somewhere if you ask them. They even gave up some of their break time to help us.
FIRST IMPRESSIONS by Maria Farrell
To get to the Tuxford Comp I have to go down a small alley which leads into Gilbert Avenue and then I have to turn right into Welbeck Place. The school is on the right of the street up a small bank. The size of school does not appear to be very large but when you start to walk round it, it stretches out a long way. There is only 1 large tall building used by the big children. Most of the buildings
